name: rad-tools-phase-2
description: The second tier of RAD tools, automating a UI GraphQL and DNA generation based on a JSON schema file.

scripts.hc:gen-dna: npm run hc:gen-dna-base && npm run hc:gen-dna-content
scripts.hc:gen-new-zome: cd dna-src && hc generate zomes/<ZOME_NAME> rust-proc
scripts.hc:gen-new-entry: cd dna-src/zomes/<ZOME_NAME>/code/src && mkdir <ENTRY_NAME> && cd <ENTRY_NAME> && touch handlers.rs mod.rs validation.rs
